1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Ibrahim bin Jarir narrated from his father that :The Prophet of Allah entered a thicket and relieved himself, then Jarir brought him a small water skin from which he cleansed himself, then he wiped his hand in the dirt

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ دَلَكَ يَدَهُ بِالأَرْضِ بَعْدَ الاِسْتِنْجَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: One who rubs his hand on the ground after cleaning himself
